original: Larsson, Gustaf Harald, provinsialläkare, Boxholm, f. 8/12/90 i Regna, östergötl. 1,, av Olof L. o, Amanda Charlotta Månsson, G, 20 m, Karin Elisabeth Björklund, Barn: Inger Karin Margareta f, 20, Märta Karin 24, Bengt Harald 28. — Stud:ex, i Norrköp. 11, rned. kand, 17 o, med. lic, 23 i Upps, Tf, prov:läk. i Töre-boda o, Markaryds distr, kortare tider 22 o, i Sollefteå distr, åtta mån, 27-28, und:läk, v, Tranås vattenkuranst, 23-24, tf, und:läk, v, Sollefteå las, 24-25, und:läk, där 25-27, därunder tf, över-läk. fyra mån,, prov:läk, i Årjäng samt järnv:läk,, disp :läk. o. läk. v. epid:-sjukst, i Ärjäng 28-40, därefter prov:-läk, i Boxholms distr. Led, av häl-sovindn i Sollefteå 27-28, led, av direkt, f, Ärjängs las. 29-40, ordf. i häl-sov:ndn i Årjäng 31-40,
translated:
Larsson, Gustaf Harald, Provincial Doctor, Boxholm, b. 8/12/90 in Regna, East Gothland. Son of Olof L. and Amanda Charlotta Månsson. Married to Karin Elisabeth Björklund in 1920. Children: Inger Karin Margareta, b. 1920, Märta Karin, b. 1924, Bengt Harald, b. 1928. 

Education: Passed the final secondary school examination in Norrköping in 1911. Graduated with a Medical Bachelor's degree in 1917, and received a Medical Licentiate degree from Uppsala University in 1923.

Professional experience: Acting Provincial Doctor in Töreboda and Markaryd districts for shorter periods in 1922, and in Sollefteå district for eight months in 1927-1928. Assistant Doctor at the Tranås water cure institution from 1923-1924, and acting Assistant Doctor at Sollefteå hospital from 1924-1925, and Assistant Doctor there from 1925-1927, including a four-month period as acting Chief Doctor. Provincial Doctor in Årjäng and Railway Doctor, Medical Inspector and Physician in charge at the Epidemic Hospital in Ärjäng from 1928-1940, then Provincial Doctor in Boxholm district.

Positions held: Member of the Health Board in Sollefteå from 1927-1928, member of the board of directors at Ärjäng hospital from 1929-1940, chairman of the Health Board in Årjäng from 1931-1940.

Please note that the dates in the last paragraph represent the years of service in the respective positions.

memberOf.name: Board of Directors at Ärjäng hospital
